actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to require the Postal Service to notify the local offices of each State employment service with respect to employment vacancies in the Postal Service.

summary.text: Requires the Postal Service to notify the local offices of each State employment service with respect to employment vacancies in the Postal Service. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 1003)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to require the Postal Service to notify the local offices of each State employment service with respect to employment vacancies in the Postal Service.
